ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents people besides Alan Robertson and System Admins from changing the account owner on Partner Accounts.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name="Partner Account", NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(ISCLONE()), ISCHANGED(OwnerId), NOT(OR($User.ProfileId="00ej0000000tMiv", $User.Id="0050a00000Jc6mh")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Partner Account Owners can only be changed by certain users. Please contact your System Administrator for more information.
